article.title: The Rebirth of JavaFX
article.abstract: JavaFX 2 marks a significant milestone in the history of JavaFX. Now that Sun Microsystems has passed the torch to Oracle, we have seen the demise of JavaFX Script and the emerge of Java APIs (such as javafx.application.Application) for interacting with this technology. This article introduces you to this new flavor of JavaFX, where you learn about JavaFX 2 architecture and key APIs.
